title: Mori no Densetsu (Legend of the Forest)
synopsis: A tranquil forest and all of its residents must face the destruction of man. A squirrel, born and raised in the forrest, fights to defend his home and faces trials and adversities along the way.
staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Director']], ['Kawajiri, Yoshiaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Kurahashi, Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Suzuki, Shinichi', ['Key Animation']]]
